Key Match Events: Carlos Rodon struck out nine in six dominant innings
Rodon allowed just one run and three hits
Rodon had 25 swings and misses, the most by a Yankee pitcher in a postseason game in the pitch-tracking era
Post-Match Reflections: Aaron Boone said it was a dominant performance in Game 1 of the Championship Series
Matt Blake mentioned it was huge for everybody to see Rodon come and complete six solid innings

Rodon gave up a solo homer in the sixth inning
